question:
####[ANCUR](https://twitter.com/anr_ruleswiki) UFAQ [Michael Boggs]
If the Runner has both Dadiana Chacon and [Order of Sol](/en/card/06058) installed, can the Runner keep Dadiana Chacon from trashing herself by triggering Order of Sol first?
answer: No. Although the Runner can trigger Order of Sol first, Dadiana Chacon will still be trashed.
